ValidationRule.description: added for GTMS-6905 - Prevent Opp Closing Status Without Document Validation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closing'), hasSubsidyPartner__c = true, OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL( LOI_Status__c , 'Signed')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( Account.Datashare_Status__c, 'Signed'))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The appropriate documentation has not yet been validated to allow this Insurance Subsidy Opportunity to move forward into the Closing stage. Please Slack the #insurance-partners channel to confirm SCL and Datashare status.
